name: KARTHIK .V
company_address: 9F, villaiyattu mariyamman kovil street,raijiv nagar, suriyampalayam,, na, ERODE, TAMILNADU, 638005
my_business: As a professional painting contractor, I specialize in delivering high-quality painting services tailored to meet residential, commercial, and industrial needs. With expertise in both interior and exterior painting, I ensure precision, durability, and aesthetic appeal in every project. My offerings include wall painting, textured finishes, waterproof coatings, spray painting, and the use of special-purpose paints like JSW and imported varieties.
top_product: My top products include Asian Paints and JSW Paints, both of which are renowned for their premium quality and innovative solutions. I use Asian Paints for a wide range of residential and commercial applications, including decorative finishes and wall treatments, ensuring long-lasting results. JSW Paints are my go-to for industrial and waterproof coatings, providing superior protection and durability for exterior surfaces
ideal_referral: My ideal referral would be homeowners, property developers, real estate agents, or business owners who need professional painting services, whether for residential, commercial, or industrial properties. Specifically, I’m looking for clients who value high-quality finishes, reliable timelines, and specialized services like waterproof coatings and decorative painting. Referrals for projects that require advanced painting techniques or a focus on durable, long-lasting results would be perfect
top_problem_solved: My top problem solved was addressing a delay in the supply of high-quality paint for a commercial project. By proactively contacting the supplier and arranging for an expedited delivery, I ensured that the project continued without any setbacks, meeting the client’s tight deadline while maintaining the quality and durability of the finish
my_favourite_bni_story: My favorite BNI story involves a referral I received for a commercial building that needed urgent painting and waterproofing. The client was referred to me by a fellow BNI member who trusted my expertise in handling large-scale projects. After completing the job on time and to the highest standards, the client was so impressed with the results that they referred me to three other businesses in their network. This experience not only strengthened my relationship with that member but also helped expand my business through BNI’s powerful referral system.
